\(
\begin{array}{l}
x_1+2 x_2 \leq 60 \\
2 x_1+x_2 \leq 30 \\
x_1-x_2 \geq-10 \\
x_1 \geq 0 ; x_2 \geq 0
\end{array}
\)

\)

\(

\(
\begin{array}{l}

x_1 \leq 400 \\
x_2 \leq 700 \\
x_1, x_2 \geq 0
\end{array}
\)
